pkgmetadata.longdescription: Access Data from the USDA ARMS Data API // Interface to easily access data via the United States Department of Agriculture (USDA)'s Agricultural Resource Management Survey (ARMS) Data API https://www.ers.usda.gov/developer/data-apis/arms-data- api/. The downloaded data can be saved for later off-line use. Also provide relevant information and metadata for each of the input variables needed for sending the data inquery.
